comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: More about the silent documentary film Nanook of the North: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nanook_of_the_North www.criterion.com/films/574 www.moma.org/collection/browse_results.php?object_id=89346

comment.author: 92311483@N00
comment._content:
nanook of the north isnt a documentary; it is mostly made up.
 for example, nanook didnt really try to eat the record, flaherty told him to do this.
and the fishing part was actually someone pulling the string at another hole.
nevertheless, nanook is a piece of history!
